import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Stock_info_form from "components/Forms/FetchStockData.js"; import {StockPriceChart} from "variables/charts.js" ; import { SwitchTab } from "components/Switch/ToggleSwitch"; import Csv_reader from "utils/data.js" // reactstrap components import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; function Analysis() { const [stock_data, setStock_data] = useState({}); const [data, SetAnalyticsData] = useState({}); const [file, upLoadFile] = useState(); function handleFileUpload(event) { upLoadFile(event.target.files[0]) } async function fetch_data (tickers, start_date, end_date) { let request_url = `http://localhost:8000/data/load_hist_stock_price/${start_date}/${end_date}?`; const ticker_list = tickers.split(',').map(function(item){ return item.trim(); }) for (let i = 0; i < ticker_list.length; i++){ if (i == 0){ request_url += `q=${ticker_list[i]}`; console.log(`q=${ticker_list[i]}`) } else{ request_url += `&q=${ticker_list[i]}`; console.log(`q=${ticker_list[i]}`) } }; const response = await fetch(request_url); const data = await response.json(); const dataset = []; for (let i = 0; i < ticker_list.length; i ++){ let data_dict = { label:ticker_list[i], pointRadius: 0, pointHoverRadius: 0, borderWidth: 3, tension: 0.4, fill: false, data: data[ticker_list[i]]}; dataset.push(data_dict) }; const line_chart_data = {labels: data['date'], datasets: dataset}; setStock_data(line_chart_data); SetAnalyticsData(data); } const tickers = Object.keys(data).filter(item => item !== 'date').join(", "); //TODO: categorize analysis: option -> options, filter -> filters return ( <>
Get Data Get Data Stock Filters

Tickers: {tickers}

PCA

Tickers: {tickers}

Liquidity

Tickers: {tickers}

Binomial

Tickers: {tickers}

Black Sholes

Tickers: {tickers}

Geske

Tickers: {tickers}

VaR

Tickers: {tickers}

); } export default Analysis;
